      public Collection<GameUser> getUsersWithPermissionsOn(int itemID)

    • removeOwner

      public boolean removeOwner(int itemID, int oldUserID)
      Deletes the all permission relationships between oldUser and item from the in-memory representation and marks them as deleted in the database.
      Parameters:
      itemID - ID of the item to be marked as deleted
      oldUserID - ID of the user who no longer owns the item
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, and false otherwise.

    • setOwner

      public boolean setOwner(int itemID, int userID)
      Creates the owner-permission relationships between user and item from the in-memory representation and in the database.
      Parameters:
      itemID - ID of the item to be marked as deleted
      userID - ID of the user who no longer owns the item
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, and false otherwise.

    • check

      public boolean check(int itemID, int userID, Permission p)
      Determines whether or not the passed user has specified permission on the passed item.
      Parameters:
      itemID - ID of the item being checked
      userID - ID of the user being checked
      p - Permission being verified
      Returns:
      true if the user has the permission, false otherwise.

    • grant

      public boolean grant(int itemID, int userID, Permission p)
      Grants the passed user the specified permission for the specified item
      Parameters:
      itemID - ID of the item whose permissions are being changed
      userID - ID of the user who is being given the permission
      p - Permission being added
      Returns:
      true if the permission was granted, false otherwise (including if the permission was already active)

    • revoke

      public boolean revoke(int itemID, int userID, Permission p)
      Revokes from the passed user the specified permission for the specified item
      Parameters:
      itemID - ID of the item whose permissions are being changed
      userID - ID of the user who is losing the permission
      p - Permission being removed
      Returns:
      true if the permission was revoked, false otherwise (including if the permission was already not present)

    • refresh

      public void refresh(BulletZoneData bzData, List<? extends OwnableEntityRepository> repos, GameUserRepository gameUserRepo)
      Reads the database and fills the HashMaps as appropriate. Intended to be called once at time of initialization.
      Parameters:
      bzData - reference to BulletZoneData for making further SQL queries
      repos - List of repositories of entities that can be owned
      gameUserRepo - repository of users that can own things
